snippet: Oklahoma pitcher Jonathan Gray and Stanford pitcher Mark Appel, viewed as the top prospects in this week’s amateur draft, were overlooked as the finalists for the Golden Spikes Award.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma pitcher Jonathan Gray and Stanford pitcher Mark Appel, viewed as the top prospects in this week’s amateur draft, were overlooked as the finalists for the Golden Spikes Award.

headline.main: College Baseball’s Top Prospects Are Not Finalists
